text: وَلَقَدْ أَهْلَكْنَا مَا حَوْلَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْقُرَىٰ وَصَرَّفْنَا ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَرْجِعُونَ

translation.en.sahih: And We have already destroyed what surrounds you of [those] cities, and We have diversified the signs [or verses] that perhaps they might return [from disbelief].
translation.id.indonesian: Dan sesungguhnya Kami telah membinasakan negeri-negeri di sekitarmu dan Kami telah mendatangkan tanda-tanda kebesaran Kami berulang-ulang supaya mereka kembali (bertaubat).
